name: Pony Island (itch)
description:
Want to play the REAL Pony Island? I started with this game jam submission about a year ago and now the full 2.5 hour experience is on Steam!

Awarded one of Zoe Quinn's Top 10 Games of 2014

This game was developed for Ludum Dare 31 in 48 hours.

Ludum Dare entry page

If you get stuck, a guide can be found here.
